data.name: Jelly In The Dark
data.detailed_description:
[h2Escape from the Ant Kingdom full of ants![/h2]
You are a fragrant and delicious jelly in an ant's den, and you are currently wanted.


The goal is to survive somehow.
Survive and escape.



  • It's a must to apply soil to hide the smell!

Let's shovel the soil piled up all over the map and use it.
If you run out of dirt gauges and get caught... there will be a big trouble.


  • Various endings that change with a small choice
Let's collect more than 20 endings.
Let's make the ending collection rate 100%.


  • There is not one way out
Ant Kingdom is wider than you think and there are many places to go.
Maybe getting out isn't the only answer...


  • Unique items
Collect items and use them wisely
Let's find ingenious ways to use it!

data.short_description: Jelly bear who fell into an ant kingdom, Lucky! Can he survive with a sweet smell against ants? (Caution! There is not one way out.)
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7,8,10
  • Processor: Single Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT D3, ATI Radeon HD4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
